body.name: Toddler Activities Preschool Learning Busy Book - 29 Themes Binder Montessori Toys for Toddlers, Workbook Activity Autism Materials and Tracing Coloring
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 21 hrs 29 mins
features: ⭐【29 THEMES】 Busy book has 15 themes and 14 drawing and writing pages, including letters, numbers, colors, fruits, color sorting, vegetables, shapes, food, animals, animal puzzles, transportation, body parts, transportation puzzles, toy storage, changing clothes; and beyond that, your toddler can draw on the drawing binder on the back. Comes with 8 colored pens. Preschool busy book is an educational toy suitable for preschool teaching aids, and homeschool preschool education tools for toddlers!

⭐【PRESCHOOL ACTIVITY BOOK】 This toddler activity book preschool learning toy helps build the connection between learning and play, The Montessori busy books provides self-repetitive exercises to improve fine motor skills, cognitive skills, basic literacy, memory, recognition , hand-eye coordinat and attention. Help todders form seek matching thinking, perceiving color, and logical knowledge. Regular simple toys include primary therapy sessions, speech therapy, and tactile experiences.

⭐【MONTESSORI PRESCHOOL LEARNING BOOK】This autism learning materials is multifunctional, sensory growth, allowing children to develop fine motor skills, language and problem solving, communication, language and problem solving, improve basic literacy, memory, Recognition, hand-eye coordination, imagination, logic and visual perception. It is also the ideal teaching aid for speech therapy for autism and speech delay, the perfect montessori toys for toddlers!

⭐【100% SAFETY GUARANTEE】 Our toddler learning activities Busy Books are certified (CPC, Children's Product Certificate), made of safe and non-toxic materials, and double thickened for long-term use. Special anti-cut edge and rounded corner design protect small hands, not easy to bend, deform and tear. It's powerful and best for nurturing a preschooler's scientific, marine, sensitive knowledge base when repeatedly pasting workbooks.

⭐【BEST TRAVEL TOY CHOICE】 Keep your toddler busy with toddler travel toys, and learning resources for home school, preschool, kindergarten centers, airplane activities, road trips, classrooms, or dining rooms. These toddler learning books include a storage bag easy to carry and suitable for rides, planes, churches, trains, parks, camping, etc. The Montessori book toys are the perfect gift for boy/girl/baby/1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th, 5th, 6th, 7th Birthday, Christmas, New Year, and Thanksgiving.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Busy Book & Drawing Book 15 learning matching themes,14 pages of drawing and writing themes, comes with 8 color markers, makes it both a busy book and a drawing book We have several improvements when compare to the previous version 1. 15 learning matching themes, Let your children learn more abundant knowledge. 2. 14 pages of drawing and writing themes, exercise your child's artistic talent. 3. Comes with 8 Coloring Markers, so that your child can paint on the back at will. 4. Let parents stick hooks & Loop Velcro for the book, safety guaranteed 5. Anti-cutting edge design for all pages, won't hurt little hands 6. Super strong hooks & Loop Velcro, It is not easy to fall and lose. 7. Much bright & vibrant color

Edge Anti-harm Design The edges of the book are designed with wavy shapes, and edges of the cards are rounded, which are designed to avoid any potential harm. Quality Velcro The Velcro is made of high-quality materials, sticking more firmly, and can be used repeatedly by your children, and there is plenty of Velcro. Accessories Subpackage The busy books and each theme card have their own packaging for easy access and storage. The color box packaging is the perfect choice for gifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Funtime & Learning tool for SAHM
reviews.reviewText: I love this book! Great illustrations, and so many activities including writing. The little eraser markers are perfect and we had fun putting the Velcro stickies on the pieces together. Great busy book for at home, a class or trips. Would definitely buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My toddler loves this ! We bring it everywhere
reviews.reviewText: The product is great! Sturdy and it comes with everything you need including the sticky dots to attach the pieces and about 8 or 9 dry erase markers. The only downside was that it is time consuming to attach the pieces using the sticky dots but this product keeps my toddler entertained in the car , out to eat etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought this for my son !
reviews.reviewText: Great quality , and great activities for my preschooler .We love it .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps my daughter engaged
reviews.reviewText: It says 3+ but my 2 year old likes all the activities in this book. The velcro is strong and durable. She hasn’t played with drawing letters yet but markers are also durable. She does need help with some activities but really likes to do some of them independently. Very satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Awesome busy book, missing pieces
reviews.reviewText: This busy book is awesome! Excellent quality. You do have to individually place each Velcro sticker, very easy, somewhat time consuming but you know that before you buy. Would be 5 stars if it were a complete set. We are missing the number cards. Like other reviewers we got 2 sets of holiday cards instead. Hopefully they can replace the numbers, too late to scan, print and laminate myself as the Velcro stickers are on. Would check the entire set before you sit down to put together. Overall great book, perfect for ASD toddler!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such an amazing activity book
reviews.reviewText: Such a great book. So many activities. Great learning option

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great teaching tool for littles
reviews.reviewText: This book beyond meet my expectations! I have 2 year old triplet granddaughters and they love this workbook. It's easy to assemble. As simple as putting a velcro dot on the back on the cards and a clear velcro dot on the specified spots in the workbook. The clear velcro dot let's the pictures in the book remain clear. Each page is laminated with dry erase compatible material, so you can wipe away any marks from tracing practice. I am contemplating getting getting 2 more so the girls stop fighting over it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like how this product has so much fun things to do, it was worth the money.
